DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the safety, tolerability, and PK of various increasing single and multiple doses of VBP15 in healthy adult subjects.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Single Ascending Dose and Multiple Ascending Dose Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of VBP15 in Healthy Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: For the Single Ascending Dose Study (SAD): Male subjects, ages 18 to 65 years, inclusive. For the Multiple Ascending Dose Study (MAD): Male subjects or female subjects of nonchildbearing potential ages 18 to 65, inclusive. For the MAD Study: Women of childbearing potential. Clinically significant abnormal laboratory parameters
